text: The Ultimate Table Tennis is a professional level table tennis league in India. It was launched in 2017 and contested by 6 teams. It is organized by 11Sports promoted by Niraj Bajaj and Vita Dani and held under the aegis of Table Tennis Federation of India. It is broadcast by Star Sports. The current champions are Chennai Lions, who won the title in their debut season after defeating the defending champions Dabang Delhi T.T.C in the season 3 finals in 2019. ==Teams== ===Current teams=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:70%;" |- !colspan=2 style="color:#fff; background:#0101df;"|Team !style="color:#fff; background:#0101df;"|City !style="color:#fff; background:#0101df;"|Debut !style="color:#fff; background:#0101df;"|Stadium |- |style="background:yellow;"| |Chennai Lions |Chennai, Tamil Nadu |text- align:center;"|2019 |Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium |- |style="background:purple;"| |Dabang Delhi T.T.C |Delhi, NCR |text-align:center;"|2017 |Thyagaraj Sports Complex |- |style="background:blue;"| |Goa Challengers |Goa |text- align:center;"|2018 | - |- |style="background:orange;"| |Puneri Paltan T.T. |Pune, Maharashtra |text-align:center;"|2019 |Shree Shiv Chhatrapati Sports Complex |- |style="background:pink;"| |RP-SG Mavericks Kolkata |Kolkata, West Bengal |text-align:center;"|2017 |Netaji Indoor Stadium |- |style="background:red;"| |U Mumba T.T. |Mumbai, Maharashtra |text- align:center;"|2019 |Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Indoor Stadium |} ===Owners=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:70%;" |- !style="width:20%; color:#fff; background:#0101df;"|Team !style="width:20%; color:#fff; background:#0101df;"|Owners !style="width:5%; color:#fff; background:#0101df;"|Indian Head coach !style="width:25%; color:#fff; background:#0101df;"|Foreign Head coach !style="width:25%; color:#fff; background:#0101df;"|Kit Manufacturer !style="width:25%; color:#fff; background:#0101df;"|Kit Sponsor |- |Chennai Lions |Aishwaryaa Rajinikanth Dhanush |A Muralidhar Rao | Peter Engel | | |- |Dabang Delhi T.T.C |Do It Sports |Sachin Shetty |Vesna Ojstersek |T10 Sports |ART |- ||Goa Challengers |Shrinivas Dempo, Vivek Bhargava |Arup Basak |Bettine Vriesekoop | | |- |Puneri Paltan T.T. |Insurekot Sports Pvt. Ltd. |Parg Agarwal |Francisco Santos |Shiv Naresh |Kotak |- |RP-SG Mavericks Kolkata |Sanjiv Goenka, Utsav Parekh |N Ravichandran |Zoltan Batorgi |Puma |Inox |- |U Mumba T.T. |U Sports |Soumyadeep Roy |Jiaqi Zheng | |UpGrad |} ===Former teams=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:70%;" |- !style="width:20%; color:white; background:black;"|Team !style="width:20%; color:white; background:black;"|Debut !style="width:20%; color:white; background:black;"|Dissolved !style="width:20%; color:white; background:black;"|Owner |- |Falcons TTC |2017 |2018 |Rizwan Amlani |- |Shazé Challengers |2017 |2017 |Vivek Bhargava |- |Oilmax-Stag Yoddhas |2017 |2017 |Oilmax Energy Pvt Ltd & Stag International |- |Maharashtra United |2017 |2018 |DHFL |- |Warriors T.T.C. |2018 |2018 |Kellogg's |} == Tournament seasons and results == There have been three seasons so far with three different winners. Falcons TTC and Dabang Delhi TTC have been in finals two times. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" ! rowspan="2" scope="col" |Season ! colspan="3" width="50%" |Final ! rowspan="2" scope="col" |Final venue ! rowspan="2" width="10%" scope="col" |Number of teams |- ! scope="col" |Winner ! scope="col" |Result ! scope="col" |Runner-up |- ! scope="row" style="text- align:left;" |2017 |Falcons TTC ! style="text-align:center;" |14–9 |Shazé Challengers |Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Indoor Stadium, Mumbai |6 |- ! scope="row" style="text-align:left;" |2018 |Dabang Delhi T.T.C ! style="text- align:center;" |11–7 |Falcons TTC |Netaji Indoor Stadium, Kolkata |6 |- ! scope="row" style="text-align:left;" |2019 |Chennai Lions ! style="text- align:center;" |8–1 |Dabang Delhi T.T.C |Thyagaraj Sports Complex, New Delhi |6 |} ==References== ==External links== * Table Tennis Category:2017 establishments in India Category:Sports leagues established in 2017 Category:Sport in India Category:Table tennis in India Category:Table tennis competitions in India Category:Table tennis competitions
